headline.print_headline: Rio Police Detain Protesters Before World Cup Final
headline.main: Rio Police Detain Protesters Before World Cup Final

docs.snippet: Rio de Janeiro police said on Saturday they had detained 19 people with a history of committing vandalism during protests as Brazil tries to pre-empt any potential violent demonstrations during Sunday's World Cup final....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rio de Janeiro police said on Saturday they had detained 19 people with a history of committing vandalism during protests as Brazil tries to pre-empt any potential violent demonstrations during Sunday's World Cup final.

headline.print_headline: Shakira: I Thank World Cup for Changing My Life
headline.main: Shakira: I Thank World Cup for Changing My Life

docs.snippet: Preparing to perform at her third World Cup, pop star Shakira says she thanks football for changing her life....
docs.lead_paragraph: Preparing to perform at her third World Cup, pop star Shakira says she thanks football for changing her life.

headline.print_headline: Syrian Rebel Commander Assassinated in Jordan: Police
headline.main: Syrian Rebel Commander Assassinated in Jordan: Police

docs.snippet: A Syrian rebel commander has been shot dead in the Jordanian capital in the first such incident on the kingdom's territory since the start of the conflict in Syria in 2011, a police source said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Syrian rebel commander has been shot dead in the Jordanian capital in the first such incident on the kingdom's territory since the start of the conflict in Syria in 2011, a police source said on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: UK to Demand Job Assurances in Foreign Takeovers: Sky News
headline.main: UK to Demand Job Assurances in Foreign Takeovers: Sky News

docs.snippet: Britain is to set out proposals to force foreign buyers of key UK companies to make binding commitments to secure jobs and research budgets, Sky News reported on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain is to set out proposals to force foreign buyers of key UK companies to make binding commitments to secure jobs and research budgets, Sky News reported on Saturday.

headline.sub: U.N. Security Council urges ceasefire between Israel,Palestinians
headline.main: U.N. Security Council urges ceasefire between Israel,Palestinians

docs.snippet: The U.N. Security Council issues a statement calling for a ceasefire between Palestinians and Israelis. Rough cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N. Security Council issues a statement calling for a ceasefire between Palestinians and Israelis. Rough cut (no reporter narration).

headline.print_headline: Israel Fires Into Lebanon After Rockets Launched Over Border
headline.main: Israel Fires Into Lebanon After Rockets Launched Over Border

docs.snippet: Rockets fired from Lebanon hit Israeli territory on Saturday and Israel's army responded with artillery fire, Lebanese security sources and the Israeli military said, in the second such incident in two days....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rockets fired from Lebanon hit Israeli territory on Saturday and Israel's army responded with artillery fire, Lebanese security sources and the Israeli military said, in the second such incident in two days.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Undone by Poor Defending, Dutch Take Third
headline.main: Brazil Undone by Poor Defending, Dutch Take Third

docs.snippet: Dreadful defending cost Brazil dear yet again on Saturday as the World Cup hosts slumped to a 3-0 loss to the Netherlands in a playoff for third place, underlining just how far the 'Selecao' have fallen down world soccer's pecking order....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dreadful defending cost Brazil dear yet again on Saturday as the World Cup hosts slumped to a 3-0 loss to the Netherlands in a playoff for third place, underlining just how far the 'Selecao' have fallen down world soccer's pecking order.
